alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 5:33PM EDT until March 18 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 433 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Panama City Beach to 27 miles south of Santa Rosa Beach, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Ebro, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Seaside, Bahama Beach, Bennett, Porter Lake, Brannonville, Millville and West Bay. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
